name: guppy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small brightly coloured tropical fish: The stream was absolutely full of guppies. Male guppies attract females by swimming next to them and showing off the bright orange markings on their sides.
More examplesFewer examplesGuppies are extremely easy to breed because a female can give birth a number of times from a single mating.His mouth flaps like that of a guppy.Female guppies, which do not have a mating season, are constantly stalked by males.Guppies were introduced to the swamp and soon ate large numbers of mosquito larvae, reducing the adult population.
